import React, { Component } from 'react'; import data from "../Data/data.json"; import {useHistory} from "react-router-dom"; import * as functions from "../functions"; import { Container, Col, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Button, Row, } from 'reactstrap'; const Login = () => { const history = useHistory(); const goToPage = (pageName) => history.push(pageName); const productData = data.productList; const goToSignupPage = () => { goToPage('SignUp.js') } return (

 ); } export default Login
